title: Virtual Volume
description: Are you afraid that your volume keys will break soon?Don't you like that Android has no volume control on youtube and in the other multimedia applications?This application add a floating volume button on the screen. Use it to modify the volume.Please, before to buy, try the free version. They have the same functionality.Thanks to Prajwal Divate for designing the Icon, Banner and Screenshots.(Google+ https://plus.google.com/+PrajwalKDivate)
descriptionHTML:
Are you afraid that your volume keys will break soon?
Don't you like that Android has no volume control on youtube and in the other multimedia applications?

This application add a floating volume button on the screen. Use it to modify the volume.

Please, before to buy, try the free version. They have the same functionality.

Thanks to Prajwal Divate for designing the Icon, Banner and Screenshots.
(Google+ https://plus.google.com/+PrajwalKDivate)
comments: This app has a weird bug that drove me nuts till I finally Uninstalled it and the problem stopped. Whenever I tried to lower or raise the volume of media on my phone the media volume bar would start glitching moving back and forth by itself not lowering or raising the volume no matter what I did even when using the volume buttons on the phone. Phone is a Samsung note 8.
I think Claudio has put a lot of TLC into this app.  The on screen volume bar is a nice touch amongst many, especially for Tablet users.  Reviewer: Non affiliated really old sysprog.
So far so good. Very useful for YouTube. And no need to use the hard buttons. The ability to customise colour is great too.
It is closed after some time
Great set of features. Some of these might be buggy a bit sometimes though but overall app usability, configurability, user experience and friendliness are really high. Nice work!
Nice because it keeps it simple, utilises native volume GUI.
recentChanges: Removed the "Current App checking type" setting
New Setting "Vibrate on change volume using the notification"
Open Wear Play Store to install Wear App
Bug Fix: sidebar disappears when rotate mobile
